feasible.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a plan, idea, or method that is feasible is possible and is likely to work
feasible.translation[0].definitions[0].e: It was no longer financially feasible to keep the community centre open.
feasible.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a plan, idea, or method that is feasible is possible and likely to work
feasible.translation[1].definitions[0].e: That may be the only feasible way of solving the problem.
Powerful computers have made it feasible to search through millions of records at great speed.
